EGS_Float E
 The spectrum energy.

Detailed Description

A monoenergetic particle spectrum.

A monoenergetic spectrum is defined in the input file via 

  :start spectrum:
      type = monoenergetic
      energy = the kinetic energy of the particles
   :stop spectrum:
